title: Professional redesign with logo, claim form, confirmation animation, and admin panel

requirements.text: Replace all existing logo/header references with the uploaded Vitalist Water brand logo (vitalis-logo.png). Use it in the header/Logo component at full quality with appropriate sizing. Remove text-only fallbacks where the image is available. Ensure the logo is crisp and prominent at the top of the page.

quotes: ALSO ITS MAY LOOK BEST AND HERE IS THE LOGO

acceptanceCriteria: The Vitalist Water logo image (vitalis-logo.png) is displayed in the header section
Logo is correctly sized and not pixelated on mobile screens
Logo appears professional and prominent at the top of the page

requirements.text: Overhaul the entire visual design to a premium professional level. Apply a deep ocean-to-light-blue gradient background, elevated glassmorphism card panels with stronger blur and refined borders, high-contrast modern typography using a clean sans-serif font, refined spacing and padding, polished button styles with gradient fills and subtle glow effects, and micro-animations on interactive elements. The overall aesthetic must feel like a premium brand campaign — similar to high-end FMCG product promotions.

quotes: MAKE IT MORE BEST LIKE A PROFESIONAL

acceptanceCriteria: Visual design is noticeably more polished and premium compared to the previous version
All buttons have gradient fills with hover/active glow states
Card panels have strong glassmorphism with refined blur and border
Typography is clean, modern, and professional
Overall feel matches a premium FMCG brand campaign

requirements.text: Update the weighted reward probability in rewardGenerator.ts to: 90% chance of ₹10, 4% chance of ₹20, 3.9% chance of ₹30, 2% chance of ₹90, and 0.1% chance of ₹100. Remove any other reward amounts.
acceptanceCriteria: Reward amounts are only: ₹10, ₹20, ₹30, ₹90, ₹100
Over a large sample (~10,000), ₹10 appears ~90% of the time
₹20 appears ~4% of the time
₹30 appears ~3.9% of the time
₹90 appears ~2% of the time
₹100 appears ~0.1% of the time

requirements.text: After the scratch card reward is revealed, display a prominent 'Click to Claim Your Reward' button below the reward amount. Tapping/clicking this button scrolls to or reveals a claim form. The form must contain: a 'State' dropdown or text input, a 'City' text input, a 'Feedback' textarea, and a 'UPI ID' text input. All fields are required. The form must be styled consistently with the premium glassmorphism design theme.

quotes: ADD OPTION OF CLICK TO RECIVE THEN THERE IS A FORM STATE CITY FEEDBACK AND UPI ID

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Click to Claim Your Reward' button appears after the reward is revealed
Clicking the button reveals/scrolls to the claim form
Form contains State, City, Feedback, and UPI ID fields
All fields are required and validated before submission
Form is styled with the glassmorphism design theme

requirements.text: On claim form submission, save the entry to the Motoko backend actor. Each submission must store: the unique coupon code (VW-XXXX-XXXX), reward amount, state, city, feedback, UPI ID, and a timestamp. Expose a query method to retrieve all submissions (for the admin panel). Expose a query method to retrieve a single submission by coupon code.

quotes: THERE A ADMIN PANEL WHERE HE CHECK THE COUPON CODE
AFTER THEY FILL THIS THEY GET A NOTIFCATION MONEY WILL BE IN YOUR ACCOUNT SOON

acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor has a method to submit a claim with coupon code, reward amount, state, city, feedback, UPI ID, and timestamp
Backend actor has a query method to retrieve all submitted claims
Backend actor has a query method to look up a claim by coupon code
Data persists across calls within the same session

requirements.text: After the user submits the claim form successfully, hide the form and display a full-screen or overlay animated confirmation notification. The notification must show the message 'Money will be in your account soon!' with a celebration animation (e.g., animated checkmark, ripple/pulse effect, or animated coins/wallet icon). Animate the notification's entrance with a smooth scale-up or slide-up transition. Use brand colors (blue, white, gold).

quotes: AFTER THEY FILL THIS THEY GET A NOTIFCATION MONEY WILL BE IN YOUR ACCOUNT SOON WITH ANIMATION

acceptanceCriteria: After form submission, the form is hidden and a confirmation notification appears
Notification displays 'Money will be in your account soon!' text prominently
Notification has an animated entrance (scale-up or slide-up)
An animated icon (checkmark, coins, or wallet) is displayed
Notification uses brand colors: blue, white, gold

requirements.text: Create a separate Admin Panel page or route accessible via a hidden/discrete link (e.g., '/admin' or a small footer link). The admin panel must: display a table/list of all submitted claim entries (coupon code, reward amount, state, city, UPI ID, feedback, timestamp); allow searching/filtering by coupon code; show the total number of submissions and a breakdown of reward amounts distributed. Protect the admin panel with a simple hardcoded password prompt (e.g., 'vitalis2024'). Style it cleanly with the brand theme.

quotes: IN THIS PANEL THERE A ADMIN PANEL WHERE HE CHECK THE COUPON CODE EVERYTIME THE COUPON NO WAS DIFFRENT

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel is accessible via a discrete route or link
Admin panel is password-protected with a hardcoded password
Displays all submitted claims in a table with coupon code, reward, state, city, UPI ID, feedback, and timestamp
Supports searching or filtering by coupon code
Shows total submission count and reward amount breakdown
Styled consistently with the brand theme

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files under frontend/src/components/ui
Use the uploaded Vitalis logo image (vitalis-logo.png) as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
All sounds must remain generated via Web Audio API — no external audio files
Admin panel password must be hardcoded (no authentication system integration)
nonGoals: Real payment processing or actual UPI transfer integration
User authentication via Internet Identity for the main scratch flow

edits: Crop to tight bounds, remove white background, preserve transparent PNG (image.png > vitalis-logo.dim_300x120.png)
